entries: As a recently freed slave in Absalom, you belong to a new, closeknit social class at the heart of the city's most important trades.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Society} skill and the {@skill Lore||Absalom Lore} skill.
You gain the {@feat Streetwise} skill feat.
